text: Geng Yan (3â€“58 AD) was a general of the Eastern Han Dynasty from China. He went down in history as one of the Emperor's most influential generals. Thanks to him, the Later Han Dynasty was established. ==References== * Hou Han Shu by Fan Ye, vol. 1 (Biography of Emperor Guangwu), . Category:3 births Category:58 deaths
